title: The Case of Karen Carpenter and Christina Ricci
description: “The Case of Karen Carpenter and Christina Ricci” documents the lives of Karen Carpenter and Christina Ricci from their iconic childhoods to their life and death battle with anorexia nervosa. Christina would learn in time to speak openly of her disorder of which she would overcome. Karen would not be so lucky, and in hiding her disorder from the public and those who knew her best, would succumb to the disorder first publicizing anorexia nervosa.
author: Steven G. Carley
